Package Model.EntityModel.Enemies

Class FinalBoss

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
Model.EntityModel.Entity
Model.EntityModel.Enemies.Enemy
Model.EntityModel.Enemies.FinalBoss
public class FinalBoss extends Enemy
This class manages the final boss of the game, its characteristic is to launch rockets.
